cmd:(iso +'sudo')npm install -g cordova-hot-code-push-cli
yiding目录下（webStorm里/cmd cd进入）cordova plugin add cordova-hot-code-push-plugin
目录下添加文件cordova-hcp.json
内容：
{
  "autogenerated":true,
  "content_url":"http://www.zhidianfan.com/yiding",
  "update":"now"
}
yiding目录下（webStorm里/cmd cd进入）cordova-hcp build
完成后即可热更新传输
